tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ContentMetrics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    content_id INT,
    likes INT,
    shares INT,
    comments INT
);

CREATE TABLE content_performance (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  content_id INT,
  likes INT,
  shares INT,
  comments INT
);

CREATE TABLE content_details (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  content_id INT,
  title VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT,
  topic VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE user_engagement (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  content_id INT,
  action_type VARCHAR(20),
  action_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE posts (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    content TEXT,
    likes_count INT,
    shares_count INT,
    comments_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE Content { 
	content_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
	content_title VARCHAR(255), 
	publish_date TIMESTAMP, 
	likes INT, 
	shares INT, 
	comments INT 
}

CREATE TABLE Users { 
	user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
	username VARCHAR(50), 
	email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE, 
	join_date TIMESTAMP, 
	location VARCHAR(100) 
}

CREATE TABLE Shares { 
	share_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
	content_id UUID, 
	user_id UUID, 
	share_date TIMESTAMP, 
	platform VARCHAR(50) 
}

CREATE TABLE Comments { 
	comment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
	content_id UUID, 
	user_id UUID, 
	comment_text TEXT, 
	comment_date TIMESTAMP 
}
